episodes.title: A life of devotion or a tale of allegations?  | Cult of Fear - Asaram Bapu  | Trailer | discovery+
episodes.description:
Uncover the alleged crimes, deceit, violence and manipulations of a once-revered spiritual leader, Asaram. Gather insight through his current and former followers, and the truth behind being his devotees.

Watch Cult of Fear, streaming now on Discovery+!
